data.comment: The match is underway at Emirates Stadium.
Martin Atkinson awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 5, Ross Barkley for Aston Villa is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Thomas Partey gets his shot on target but fails to score for Arsenal.
In the minute 10, Throw-in Aston Villa.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
Free kick for Arsenal in the half of Aston Villa.
In the minute 12, Martin Atkinson awards Aston Villa a goal kick.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
Arsenal are coming forward and Willian gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 13, Aston Villa have a goal kick.
Martin Atkinson signals a Aston Villa throw-in in Arsenal's half.
Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 18, Goal kick for Aston Villa at Emirates Stadium.
Free kick in a good position for Arsenal!
Kieran Tierney (Arsenal) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
Can Aston Villa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 25, An unfortunate own goal by Bukayo Saka makes the score 0-1.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
In London Arsenal's Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang is caught offside.
In the minute 30, Arsenal drive upfield and Kieran Tierney gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Aston Villa defender.
Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in the half of Arsenal.
In the minute 32, Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Trezeguet (Aston Villa) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 34, Arsenal needs to be cautious. Aston Villa have an attacking throw-in.
Aston Villa's Jack Grealish gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Arsenal defender.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
In the minute 37, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Arsenal.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
Arsenal's Thomas Partey misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 39, Aston Villa have a goal kick.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
In London, Alexandre Lacazette (Arsenal) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Aston Villa goal kick.
Throw-in for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 43, In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ross Barkley (Aston Villa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
In the minute 45, Martin Atkinson awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Arsenal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aston Villa's half?
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in the half of Arsenal.
Mikel Arteta is making the team's first substitution at Emirates Stadium with Dani Ceballos replacing Thomas Partey.
In the minute 48, Trezeguet of Aston Villa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Arsenal's Willian breaks free at Emirates Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 49, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Martin Atkinson signals a Aston Villa throw-in in Arsenal's half.
Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Martin Atkinson signals a throw-in for Arsenal, close to Aston Villa's area.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
In the minute 54, Free kick Arsenal.
Can Arsenal capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Arsenal are pushing forward but Dani Ceballos's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 55, Martin Atkinson awards Aston Villa a goal kick.
Aston Villa push forward at Emirates Stadium and Jack Grealish gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Arsenal defence.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
In the minute 57, Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Important block from the Arsenal defence as Jack Grealish fires in a strike for Aston Villa.
Throw-in Arsenal.
In the minute 60, Aston Villa drive upfield and Ollie Watkins gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Arsenal defender.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Rob Holding of Arsenal gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Aston Villa at Emirates Stadium.
Ross Barkley (Aston Villa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Aston Villa goal kick.
In the minute 63, In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in high up the field for Arsenal in London.
Nicolas Pepe is replacing Willian for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
In the minute 65, The home team have replaced Alexandre Lacazette with Edward Nketiah. This is the third substitution made today by Mikel Arteta.
In London, Mohamed Elneny of Arsenal is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Play has been interrupted briefly in London to check on Matty Cash, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 68, Aston Villa's Matty Cash looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Arsenal's Nicolas Pepe gets in a shot on goal at Emirates Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 69, Nicolas Pepe for Arsenal gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Martin Atkinson awards Aston Villa a goal kick.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
In the minute 72, Ollie Watkins heads in to give Aston Villa a 0-2 lead at Emirates Stadium.
Ross Barkley with an assist there.
Jack Grealish (Aston Villa) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 73, Important block from the Arsenal defence as Jack Grealish fires in a strike for Aston Villa.
Free kick Aston Villa.
Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 75, Goal! Ollie Watkins extends Aston Villa's lead to 0-3.
Jack Grealish instrumental with a fine assist.
Ross Barkley (Aston Villa) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 80, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Aston Villa.
Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Arsenal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Aston Villa's half?
In the minute 82, Edward Nketiah (Arsenal) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
In London, Hector Bellerin of Arsenal is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
Aston Villa make their first substitution with Anwar El Ghazi replacing Trezeguet.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Arsenal in the half of Aston Villa.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
At Emirates Stadium the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Aston Villa in the half of Arsenal.
In London Aston Villa drive forward through Ross Barkley. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
The match has come to a close in London. The final score is 0-3.
